Do not do in code what can be done in infrastructure (2017)

stories.text:
Such auto, Much meow

This program is a toy project to demonstrate the idea of using node js to control a headless chrome browser, and control such browser programmatically.

Currently it is setted to click 9999 times and take screenshot on 1st, every 801 times and 9999 times.

https://github.com/ckanthony/Popcat-Click-Bot
stories.title: Cheat – Just wrote a bot to meow at popcat.click so I don't have to

N.S. expert says American UFO report could be about something else

stories.text:
Is there anything out there at all?
I want something like no-strength glasses with high-definition display, monochrome is acceptable.
Preferably see through, so I can walk, but also read the text.
They don't need to have bulky cameras or other sensors.
I just want some glasses to display the terminal from the raspberry pi in my backpack, so I can walk around and program or write with a chorded keyboard.
stories.title: Ask HN: Recommend display glasses for computing while walking
The ovethinking and multiple miracles over the real life
